body:
{
    "EmailSubject": "Question about 529",
    "EmailBody": "Hi guys,
 
I have a couple of quick question about the 529 college savings account?  
 
1.  What is the maximum amount of money I can contribute per for each of my childrens education?
2.  Can I move money from one 529 account over to another child's 529 account?
3.  What expenses are covered under the 529 account?  Can I cover more than tuition expenses to answer these questions?
 
Thanks,
    John Carnell"
}
